name: Classic Pong (Hylke)
description:
Endless pong

Never ending retro pong available  for free without any advertisements. Aiming for weekly updates to improve on gameplay and performance. 

Contact us here: hylkesc@gmail.com

Controls

W - Player paddle up

S - Player paddle down

Escape - Pause 

Credits

Music provided by: Siix0 | https://soundcloud.com/user-909504386/no-copyright-music-retro-city-pop-music-au...
